channel.title: Help with a webclient
channel.description: Hello, im making a webclient for my site. I was wondering how to jar the files from the client. thanks, please reply.

item.title: Help with a webclient
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

You need to add a automatic cache downloaded / extractor, fix the directories for the sprites to load from the new location, correct the signlink to load the cache from the new location and then you can jar + sign (there are tutorials for it, use the search button). Then you can implement the applet onto your site with this HTML applet code:

<applet name="##" width="##" height="##" archive="##" code="##">

Of course you need to replace the ‘##’ appropriately…

  • Applet name: Name of your applet.
  • Width: The width you wish the applet to be.
  • Height: The height you wish the applet to be.
  • Archive: The directory of your jarred client.
  • Code: The main class of your client (I’m assuming it is client.java so you would declare it as client).

Read full topic
